main event: An unidentified object was observed moving very fast across the sky in Rockville, Maryland on June 8, 1955.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a jet and had no sound,It moved from east to west at a 45-degree angle,The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute,The object did not fit the description of any known aircraft,It was initially thought to resemble a comet or a Matador missile.
witness description: a son who saw the object and called his father and mother
